channel.title: ::Yell command?!?

item.title: ::Yell command?!?
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

Hey guys its me again, anyway I have a problem with " ::yell ", when I compile it i have no errors but it just wont work in-game :S This is what I have for my yell command, there are no errors its just it doesn’t work… :

[code] }
if (cmd.startsWith(“yell”) && (cmd.length() > 5)) {
if (c.Muted() == 1 || c.IPMuted() == 1) {
String text = cmd.substring(5);
String[] bad = { “chalreq”, “duelreq”, “tradereq” };
for (String element : bad) {
if (text.indexOf(element) >= 0) {
return;
}

				c.Send(c.playerName + ":  "
						+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
						+ text.substring(1));
						c.Send(c.playerName + ":  " + cmd.substring(5));[/code]

Do I have to add something in client.java or something to make it work ??
Please answer ASAP, And Thanks In Advance

~Zofis
